articles.title: Stars and fans alike honor a Minnesota favorite son as Bob Dylan Center opens in Tulsa - Star Tribune
articles.description: With an iron gate fashioned by Dylan himself, the museum features manuscripts, films, paintings and more than 750,000 items in its digital archive.
articles.content:
